description: Provides financial assistance in the form of loans for activities that can tackle the impacts of climate change and also be income-generating.
benefits: Need-based loans as permissible under the NSFDC Term Loan Lending Policy
Interest rates as low as 2% per annum for Scheduled Castes
Maximum loan amount up to Rs. 30 lakh
Repayment tenure of 10 years, including a 6-month moratorium period
1% Rebate from NSKFDC share of interest in case of Female Beneficiaries
eligibility: Dependents of Safai Karamcharis and Scavengers are eligible
